summary: This is a brief email correspondence from June 27, 2019, transmitting Jeffrey Epstein's most recent Sex Offender Report as an attachment. The email indicates routine monitoring of Epstein's status as a registered sex offender.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the attached Sex Offender Report being transmitted in the email.

events.title: Transmission of Epstein's Sex Offender Report
events.description: An email was sent with an attachment containing Jeffrey Epstein's most recent Sex Offender Report.

keyFacts: As of June 27, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was a registered sex offender and subject to routine reporting requirements.
An official Sex Offender Report for Epstein was generated and transmitted via email on that date.
The document is a simple administrative record, indicating ongoing legal monitoring of Epstein prior to his arrest in July 2019.
